## Chess.moves() method

Returns a list of legal moves from the current position.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moves(options?: {
        square?: string;
        verbose?: boolean;
    }): (string | Move)[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { square?: string; verbose?: boolean; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

(string \| [Move](./chess.js.move.md)<!-- -->)\[\]

Piece or null
